Field Detail

PARAM_TOKENIZER

public static final String PARAM_TOKENIZER
"Tokenenizer" is a single, optional, string parameter that specifies the class type of the tokenizer that will be used by this annotator. If this parameter is not filled, then the default tokenenizer (org.cleartk.token.util.PennTreebankTokenizer) is used. A tokenenizer is defined as any implementation of the interface defined by org.cleartk.token.util.Tokenizer.

See Also:
Tokenizer, PennTreebankTokenizer, Constant Field Values

PARAM_TOKEN_TYPE

public static final String PARAM_TOKEN_TYPE
"TokenType" is a single, optional, string parameter the class type of the tokens that are created by this annotator. If this parameter is not filled, then tokens of type org.cleartk.type.Token will be created.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PARAM_WINDOW_TYPE

public static final String PARAM_WINDOW_TYPE
"WindowType" is a single, optional, string parameter that specifies the class type of annotations that will be tokenized. If no value is given, then the entire document will be tokenized at once. A good value for this parameter would be org.cleartk.type.Sentence (especially when using the PennTreebankTokenizer).

See Also:
